preconditions: User account exists in the system with valid credentials
testSteps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
expectedResult: User is successfully authenticated and redirected to dashboard

preconditions: User is on the login page
testSteps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter invalid username
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click Login button
expectedResult: Error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials

preconditions: User is authenticated and has create permissions
testSteps:
1. Navigate to create page
2. Fill in all required fields
3. Click Save button
4. Verify record appears in list
expectedResult: New record is created successfully and appears in the database
